 2012-10472012-08-27,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of LIEUTENANT-GENERAL THOMAS J. LAWSON, posted in Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States of America, to be the Chief of the Defence Staff, at the rank of General, effective on the day on which the change of command ceremony takes place.
